data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body: Sagility Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Further to our letter dated October 7 2025 we inform you that in accordance with Regulation 29 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the Board will also consider the proposal for declaration of interim dividend if any for the financial year 2025-26 at the Board meeting scheduled on October 29 2025.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 4th AGM of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday August 21 2025 at 04:00 PM IST through video conferencing. Pursuant to Regulation 34 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith the following: 1. Notice of the 4th AGM (including e-voting instructions) 2. Annual Report for the financial year 2024-25.

data.caption: This Is To Inform That The 4Th Annual General Meeting Of The Company Is Scheduled To Be Held On Thursday August 21 2025 At 04:00 PM IST Through Video Conferencing.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 4th Annual General Meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday August 21 2025 at 04:00 PM IST through video conferencing.
